00057 // SIGNAL WRITING POLICIES
00058 //
00059 // Note: if you add a new policy to the enum below you will need to add
00060 // an additional overload of sc_reset::reset_signal_is() for the sc_signal<bool>
00061 // instance. That will require changes to sysc/kernel/sc_reset.cpp and 
00062 // sysc/kernel/sc_reset.h
00063 
00064 enum sc_writer_policy
00065 {
00066   SC_ONE_WRITER        = 0, 
00067   SC_MANY_WRITERS      = 1, 
00068   SC_UNCHECKED_WRITERS = 3  
00069 };
00070 
00071 // signal forward declaration
00072 template< typename T, sc_writer_policy POL = SC_DEFAULT_WRITER_POLICY >
00073 class sc_signal;

00075 template< sc_writer_policy >
00076 struct sc_writer_policy_check;
00077 
00078 struct SC_API sc_writer_policy_nocheck_write
00079 {
00080   bool check_write( sc_object* /* target */, bool /* value_changed */ )
00081     { return true; }
00082   bool needs_update() const { return false; }
00083   void update() {}
00084 };
00085 
00086 struct SC_API sc_writer_policy_check_write
00087 {
00088   bool check_write( sc_object* target, bool value_changed );
00089   bool needs_update() const { return m_delta_only; }
00090   void update();
00091 
00092 private:
00093   static bool only_delta();
00094 
00095 protected:
00096   sc_writer_policy_check_write( bool delta_only = only_delta() )
00097     : m_delta_only( delta_only ), m_writer_p() {}
00098 
00099   const bool         m_delta_only;
00100   sc_process_handle  m_writer_p;
00101 };
00102 
00103 struct SC_API sc_writer_policy_check_delta
00104     : sc_writer_policy_check_write
00105 {
00106   // bool write_check(sc_object*, bool); /* inherited */
00107 
00108   // always force update phase to reset process
00109   bool needs_update() const { return true; }
00110 
00111   // reset current writer during update phase
00112   void update() { sc_process_handle().swap( m_writer_p ); }
00113 
00114 protected:
00115   sc_writer_policy_check_delta()
00116     : sc_writer_policy_check_write(true) {}
00117 };
00118 
00119 struct SC_API sc_writer_policy_nocheck_port
00120 {
00121   bool check_port( sc_object*, sc_port_base*, bool )
00122     { return true; }
00123 };

00128
